website_summaries.verdict: For anyone looking for style and function when they hit the gym, this supportive and comfortable bra is a must-have.
pros: Lightweight and seamless yet supportive material is great for activities like hot yoga
Perfectly shaped cups have removable padding
Provides a flattering and comfortable fit for those with any sized chest
Stylish yet functional, making it a great choice for the gym

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most flattering and comfortable sports bra I have ever owned. I'm 114lbs 5'4 and 32b and bought a small and it fits perfectly. I have trouble with other sports bras straps digging into my shoulders but with the adjustable straps this doesn't do that. The color is a very deep blue and is slightly darker than the picture shown. The cups are moulded nicely for the breast, however the padded cups can get distorted and need to be flattened out after washes.
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: I live in these bras!
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 Under Armour Yoga bras and they discontinued the old style and this new style has replaced it. Basically it has the thicker under breast band and I thought it would irritate me but I actually find it MORE comfortable because it doesn't dig into my side fat as much. I plan on ordering a few more because I do Yoga several days a week and basically live in these bras because I'm a full time student. I am a 36DD and I buy an Large which stretches perfectly for a cozy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Nikolaev

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I agree, best sports bra I've ever owned. And definitely needs to be made in a nude color. I bought it in white and agree with another reviewer, the nude color pads in the white bra do show through. But all in all, I love this bra and will buy it in black any other color UA makes it in. And thank you to another reviewer on the sizing...I did order a large even tho technically I would be a medium.
customer_reviews.author: PrD

customer_reviews.title: and they are great for that
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy! I have two of these sports bras now. I bought them for running, and they are great for that. I then started wearing them to work (I wear scrubs), and they have been a very comfortable alternative to wearing a bra. I will probably end up sewing the padding in because it shifts after going through the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: wish the white wasn't see through
customer_reviews.text: i would give this a 5 star review if it wasn't so see through. the removable cups can be seen right through the sports bra which makes it pretty unflattering. otherwise the fit is great!!! im a 30dd/30e and a size small fits perfectly and most importantly... it's sooo comfy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Material is very nice. Full coverage but still looks very athletic. I have always bought Nike and tried one of these Under Armour's seamless sports bra and I will never go back. I don't typically like Under Armour (for me) but these sports bras are amazing. I lift, run, and ride horses - the bra is perfect for all of these activities.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is too thin and the foam insert can be seen through the bra and through a white workout shirt. It also arrived with stains on the front side.
customer_reviews.author: T.Graham

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lululemon, Nike
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. I have a broad chest and about a B+. I normally have to get a XL or larger to feel only slightly comfortable. I ordered based on the size chart. I like how the panel below the cups extends. It creeps up a little but nothing like other bras. I wore this golfing in Houston heat and it was great. I will get more now.
customer_reviews.author: karencav

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable- Supportive- Will buy again !
customer_reviews.text: I bought one first from a local store so I knew my exact size. Amazon sells them a few $$ less and it’s easier than driving to the store. Amazon also has more of a selection on colors. I love the pink one! The padding is a easily removable. And the cups are very supporative. I love these and plan to buy one of every color.
customer_reviews.author: AprilBCortland

customer_reviews.title: Besides it gives great support and it feels great nxt to the skin
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and it fits me a little snug but it is wire-free which i always strive for now so i can't complain. Besides it gives great support and it feels great nxt to the skin!! I am definitely pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable this bra is. I am a 32DD and I purchased the size small and it fits great. I get medium support but don't feel squished since it is a stretchy fabric. I wouldn't wear this for running or high impact activities. It is great for everyday casual wear or low impact activities. I definitely want to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Most disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not by any means a small woman but was quite surprised that I wasn't able to get the x large over my shoulders. That would have my first Under Armour purchase. JP
customer_reviews.author: burro

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bra I'm a 34dd sometimes it's really really hard to find the correct bra that fits that's comfortable and I found this one and I bought it in three different colors still working on the other colors wash is great very stylish to
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with or without included pads
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice everyday sports bra. It provides compression around my ribs without causing muscle stress. Important to me because my ribs move out of place so it provides support where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these bras
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bras. I bought one in black @ Academy Sports locally, then came home to order one in white here at Amazon. I am normally a 38DD and the XL fits great. It is not too constrictive when stretching it to go over my head either. I normally prefer a hook-front sports bra, but this one does not bother me one bit. I have even started wearing it as an every-day bra under my scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: JenInTn

customer_reviews.title: Good but maybe not for large cup sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but the large was too low-cut for my 32DDD bust. Love the long band-really wish it had worked!
customer_reviews.author: OhSoChewey

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable & holds everything in place
customer_reviews.text: This exercise bra meets & exceeds all expectations. I use it for exercise & bike riding. It's comfortable & holds everything in place. I especially like the adjustable straps. I wish the style came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: G T GRECO

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay for lounge wear but provides NO support for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great bra
customer_reviews.text: Love these bras and have several. Will definitely buy more. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: perfect sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitting and most comfortable sports bra. The bottom band is wider than a typical sports bra which makes it lay flatter and stay in place. The front fits perfectly creating zero "spillage" even when bending over. I like that it has removable padded cups so you have an option of using/not using them. This is by far the best sports bra I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRAW EVER
customer_reviews.text: BEST BRAW EVER ! so much support and what a nice thick material. Easy to wash I even like to swim in them !
customer_reviews.author: keisha

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sports bra that I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sports bra that I have owned! I have it in 3 colors and want more. I recommend following the sizing chart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing for the amount I paid :(
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to wear under my tanks when I work out. The description says white/metallic but there’s nothing white or metallic about it. The straps and logo letters color makes it look used and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: A*****Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality sports bra, unfortunately does result with the dreaded uniboob even when using the cups. It starts out nicely but after a short time wearing everything migrated to one giant boob in the center of my chest.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanis28

customer_reviews.title: Great support, padding is a little obnocious for small-breasted women
customer_reviews.text: Great support, but I feel the padding is a little much. I took the padding out, but it doesn't look quite right. For instance, I wouldn't workout with this without a shirt on over it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and great colors!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable bra that is available in a variety of fun, vibrant colors! The colors do not fade in the washer/dryer, which cannot be said for most!
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bra - Exceedingly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit - very comfortable, but with small straps so it can be worn with anything. Feels sturdy enough, but the straps and structure are stretchy. Ever since I had a baby, it's been my absolute go-to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fastest shipping but I love the fit and look of this sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Fastest shipping but I love the fit and look of this sports bra. Definitely contours your bust and waist in flattering way. Looking forward to ordering more when more sizes become available.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Bought it for golfing, but use it for riding and showing my horses as well. Love the breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Je lis

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a small but this was so small I couldn't even get it on. My return date via email said I could return through March 3. I went to print the label and now it's saying no longer available for return. Grrr. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Waldvogel

customer_reviews.title: You can see the pads through the shirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this top in white and had to return it. The fabric covering the pads are very thin so you can see the pads through the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Ok sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style although it does run a little tighter then the UA eclipse sports bra. I liked it until I washed it, the pads crinkled up and wouldn’t return to shape so it looked weird.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small, but well-made
customer_reviews.text: This bras seems pretty well-made in terms of elastic and adjustment. It runs somewhat small.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love this sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Love this sports bra. Its padded, which was surprising, but its nice to actually be covered while wearing a sport's bra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bar far my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Been through many sports bras. This is by far my favorite. Would like to wear this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: You might want to order 1 size bigger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and very comfy fit. I'm a 34 B, and I normally wear a Medium, which I did order and try, and this is definitely a snug fitting top. I ended up returning the medium and getting the Large, which was perfect. Order one size larger than you usually wear, since they did fit snug - just depends on how comfortable you want it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Best sports bra I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and cute. I can wear it daily under any outfit without it looking bulky or weird.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Armour Seamless
product_meta.description: Best for A to C cups. Delivers strategic support, tailored for low-impact activities like yoga, pilates & hiking. Soft, removable cups for enhanced shape & coverage. Super-skinny strap pullover with adjustable triangle back design. Wide jacquard wordmark band for amazing stretch & comfort. Super-smooth, double-layer HeatGear fabric delivers superior next-to-skin feel & lasting comfort. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction .
feature_bullets: Best for A to C cups
Delivers strategic support, tailored for low impact activities like yoga, pilates & hiking
Soft, removable cups for enhanced shape & coverage
Super skinny strap pullover with adjustable triangle back design
Wide jacquard wordmark band for amazing stretch & comfort
